name: Angry Neighbor: The Temporary Neighbor
description:
You moved into a new house for a while and you see new person settling in the neighborhood. It seemed strange from day one, and now you've decided to break into his house and solve its mysteries.

Go into the neighbor's house and find neighbor's secrets but try not to be seen. Otherwise it will get worse.

And dont forget its just beta version (0.3) so everything is in early access.
